content.description: Ever wanted to climb wicked pocketed Rhyolite then go to the legendary Gila hot springs for quick hand dips to heal your gnarly ripped tendons? This crag only has a small selection of developed routes but somebody (anybody with FA/ developer information please reach out) recognized its amazing road side potential.There is seemingly many classic roadside boulders, untouched pinnacles, and lots of good fun to be had.Although the main McMillan area is not very tall the features are great and great for novice learnersÂ
